vote.title: Authorize (1) rescinding Resolution No. 22-0129, previously approved on January 12, 2022, for the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County for the design and construction of transportation improvements for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection from Webb Chapel Extension to Manana Drive and for funding participation in the design and construction of infrastructure improvements on Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway; (2) a new Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County in the amount of $200,000.00 for the design and construction of transportation improvements for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection from Webb Chapel Extension to Manana Drive and Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway which increases the City’s funding participation for the Harry Hines Project from $0.00 to $200,000.00; (3) payment to Dallas County for the City’s share of the project cost for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection project, in an amount not to exceed $125,000.00; (4) the receipt and deposit of funds from Dallas County in the amount not to exceed $1,750,000.00 for Dallas County’s share of the project costs for the Community Drive project; and (5) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $1,750,000.00 in the Capital Project Reimbursement Fund - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds ($125,000.00) and Revenue: Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($1,750,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) rescinding Resolution No. 22-0129, previously approved on January 12, 2022, for the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County for the design and construction of transportation improvements for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection from Webb Chapel Extension to Manana Drive and for funding participation in the design and construction of infrastructure improvements on Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway; (2) a new Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County in the amount of $200,000.00 for the design and construction of transportation improvements for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection from Webb Chapel Extension to Manana Drive and Community Drive from Denton Drive to Northwest Highway which increases the City’s funding participation for the Harry Hines Project from $0.00 to $200,000.00; (3) payment to Dallas County for the City’s share of the project cost for the Harry Hines Multimodal Connection project, in an amount not to exceed $125,000.00; (4) the receipt and deposit of funds from Dallas County in the amount not to exceed $1,750,000.00 for Dallas County’s share of the project costs for the Community Drive project; and (5) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $1,750,000.00 in the Capital Project Reimbursement Fund - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds ($125,000.00) and Revenue: Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($1,750,000.00)
